name: Untitled (itch) (durkio)
description:
Untitled
by Owen Durkin, Adam Wipprecht, Owen Xie

The game is an arcade shooter where each player
tries to kill the other player by bouncing their bullets off of
the wall. 

Controls are w,a,s,d and u,i,j,k to move,
q,e, and u,o, to rotate,
and x,m to shoot.

Also works with PS4 controller, with
thumbstick to move, triggers to rotate, and X button to shoot.
